About Me

Let me introduce myslef...

I am a highly focused, self-motivated and innovative developer with many years’ experience in a variety of development and engineering positions. A versatile and competent Front-end Developer with a sound knowledge and understanding of developing, maintaining and enhancing complex user interfaces. I boast knowledge of a wide range of programming languages while specialising in React. Prior experience within a System Engineer role has enabled me to gain a greater understanding and additional depth to approaching development with scalability, adaptability and reliability. I am extremely driven and determined to exceed expectations. This drive to learn more and do more is evident in successive performance and development reviews for achieving “above and beyond”. I am a methodical thinker with good problem-solving skills and high standards, achieving reliable, neat and concise coding, adhering to convention and standards. I have excellent communication and interpersonal skills that allow me to build lasting working relationships with clients, senior management and colleagues. I have also represented colleagues in my previous roles within Social Committees, to aid in the facilitation and maintenance of high office morale and team bonding.

Core Skill

Broad knowledge, skills and understanding of REACT, JavaScript, TypeScript, ES6, HTML 5, JSX, Jest, CSS3 and Storybook Light knowledge of languages such as SASS, Ajax, JSON, GraphQL, Apollo, Redux Node.JS, ASP.net, PHP, Python, Bash and SALT Good experience using management tools such as JIRA and Git Delivered many training sessions, guilds and demos including JavaScript and React Management and mentoring skills developed as a team leader and leading work courses Outstanding communication skills using a variety of methods with external and internal clients and colleagues Excellent time management and organisation skills to ensure deadlines are met Research net technologies, identify and current best practice, quickly adapt and provide technical guidance to other team members
